      • ProjectLib

        public ProjectLib​(int port,
                  java.lang.String myid,
                  ProjectLib.MessageHandling mh)
        Constructor to be used by UserNode, if asynchronous message receipt is desired.
        Parameters:
        port - Port used for Porject4 test, as sepcified on command line.
        myid - String indicating UserNode id/address, as specified on command line.
        mh - Class that exports MessageHandling interface, to which messages will be delivered.

      • ProjectLib

        public ProjectLib​(int port,
                  ProjectLib.CommitServing cs)
        Constructor to be used by Server.
        Parameters:
        port - Port used for Porject4 test, as sepcified on command line.
        cs - Class that exports CommitServing interface; startCommit will be called on this when a new candidate image needs to be commited.

      • ProjectLib

        public ProjectLib​(int port,
                  ProjectLib.CommitServing cs,
                  ProjectLib.MessageHandling mh)
        Constructor to be used by Server, if asynchronous message receipt is desired.
        Parameters:
        port - Port used for Porject4 test, as sepcified on command line.
        cs - Class that exports CommitServing interface; startCommit will be called on this when a new candidate image needs to be commited.
        mh - Class that exports MessageHandling interface, to which messages will be delivered.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(ProjectLib.Message msg)
        Send a message. Send a message to any node.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to send. msg.addr indicates destination.

      • getMessage

        public ProjectLib.Message getMessage()
        Receive a message. Blocking call that gets the next message from the receive queue for this node.
        Returns:
        Message strucure, with addr set to source

      • fsync

        public void fsync()
        Sync to disk. Perform emulated fsync operation to flush to stable storage.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shutdown. Shutdown library, and terminate process. Will not return.

      • askUser

        public boolean askUser​(byte[] img,
                       java.lang.String[] sources)
        Ask user if image is acceptable. Asks user if the candidate image is acceptable.
        Parameters:
        img - byte array with contents of candidate image file
        sources - array of strings, each of which names a local file contributing to candidate image
        Returns:
        true if user is happy with candidate image, false otherwise
